mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat (room_id, sender, receiver, message, time, is_read) VALUES ( #{roomId}, #{sender},#{receiver}, #{message}, #{messagetime}, #{isRead})
mapper.select: SELECT message_id AS id, room_id AS roomId, sender AS sender, receiver AS receiver, message AS message, time AS time, is_read AS isRead FROM chat WHERE room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY time;
